title: Former Nintendo President's Memoir on a Life of Leadership
itunes:title: Former Nintendo President's Memoir on a Life of Leadership
description:
Reggie Fils-Aimé, Former President and COO of Nintendo, discusses his book Disrupting the Game: From the Bronx to the Top of Nintendo.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
